name: Clarice: The Storyteller
description:
"Darkness can be lit up by good stories"

"Close your eyes. What do you see?"
"Nothing"
"I see a wonderful world ..."

Clarice, a young storyteller, teaches her secret to a disillusioned Dungeon Master and helps him create unforgettable adventures!

Clarice is a story game that lasts around 30 minutes and uses Word Game to complement the gameplay.
